# [Interview #186: USA Today Interview, Entry #35](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=186#35)

#### Neenah, Wisconsin

What is it like driving your Porsche?

#### Robert Jordan

It's wonderful! Especially if I'm somewhere where I can get up to speed.
